tool.name: Cluster ligands using SuCOS
tool.description: Tool to score docked poses using SuCOS
tool.help:
**What it does?**
This tool clusters molecules based on the overlap of 3D features as determined by SuCOS.
Clustering uses a clustering threshold that can be set by the usere. The default threshold is 0.8.s
The original SuCOS code is on GitHub: https://github.com/susanhleung/SuCOS The SuCOS work is described here: https://chemrxiv.org/articles/SuCOS_is_Better_than_RMSD_for_Evaluating_Fragment_Elaboration_and_Docking_Poses/8100203
**Input**
Molecules such as an SD file dataset in history.
**Output**
A series of SDF files, one for each cluster containing the molecules in that cluster
